Html:
The DataGrid's scrollbar makes the grid look very ugly by leaving a gap at the top next to the column headers. One can solve this problem by placing the DataGrid in a ScrollViewer which will look fine BUT then the GridHeaders will also scroll.
Considering WPF is all about presentation, is there anyway to get the same behaviour as with the scrollviewer but without the Columnheaders disappearing.

I actually think the gap is a bug. I've filed a bug in our database to track the issue.

Ben
